text: Loireauxence is a commune of 7,522 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 from the former communes of Varades (the seat), Belligné, La Chapelle-Saint-Sauveur and La Rouxière.Arrêté préfectoral 18 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Loireauxence
